parameters.name: job_id
parameters.description: (int64) The ID of the job whose compliance status you are requesting.

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

404.description: Operation was performed on a resource that does not exist.

429.description: Operation is rejected due to throttling, e.g. some resource has been exhausted, per-user quota.

get.description: Returns the policy compliance status of a job. Jobs could be out of compliance if a cluster policy they use was updated after the job was last edited and some of its job clusters no longer comply with their updated policies.
